mapper.insert: insert into free_board values (get_seq('freeboardSeq'), #{mem_no}, null, 0, #{free_title}, #{free_content}, sysdate(), 0, free_board_no, 0, 0, 0 )
insert into free_board values (get_seq('freeboardSeq'), #{mem_no}, null, 0, #{free_title}, #{free_content}, sysdate(), 0, #{free_group_no}, #{free_group_order}+1, #{free_group_depth}+1, 0 )
update free_board set free_group_order=free_group_order+1 where free_group_no=#{free_group_no} and free_group_order>#{free_group_order}
mapper.select: select count(*) from free_board where free_group_no=#{free_board_no}
mapper.update: update free_board set free_show=1, free_title='', free_content='' where free_board_no=#{free_board_no}

choose.when: where free_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or free_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: select IFnull(count(*),0) from free_board ff inner join member_Info mm on ff.mem_no=mm.mem_no

select ff.*,mm.mem_no,mm.Nickname from free_board ff inner join member_Info mm on ff.mem_no=mm.mem_no
order by ff.free_group_no desc, ff.free_group_order asc limit #{startRow},10
mapper.update: update free_board set free_hit=free_hit+1 where free_board_no=#{free_board_no}
mapper.select: select * from free_board where free_board_no = (select free_board_no from free_board where free_board_no < #{free_board_no} order by free_board_no desc limit 1)
select * from free_board where free_board_no = (select free_board_no from free_board where free_board_no > #{free_board_no} order by free_board_no limit 1)
